chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
yes
alright! i'm at the starting point now, next to a twig that leads to a small island with a tiger
which way do i go from here?
go towards the tiger
cool, i'm now on the island with the tiger
from here, i see another small island to the south-east with a butterfly, and a big island to south-west with a parrot on a tree. where to next, amigo?
go south west with parrot
hey i'm on the parrot island now
just to clarify, i see an elephant to the left, three rocks leading to a new island with a frog, which is to the southeast. you lead, i follow!
go southeast
i'm currently chilling with the frog on the new island
continue unto to the crocodile
alright, i'm standing next to the crocodile now
go the the island with the giraffe
got it! i'm now at the giraffe's location
i see a snake to the southeast and an elephant to the left. where should i go next?
go southeast to the snake
i'm hanging out with the snake now
go forward you will see the treasure
wohoo! i have reached the treasure
thanks for leading me amigo! *finished*
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
¡genial! entonces, estás en la esquina superior derecha del mapa, justo al lado del perro blanco
lo que debes hacer ahora es caminar un poco hacia la izquierda, justo debajo de ese banco de madera y cruza el sendero en dirección al puesto de flores
cross the part towards the flower
thumbs up! but instead of hitting the florist stand, let's take a sharp u-turn to the left
cross that trail again and head back where our white furry friend is
okay
alright, now cross over the branch, below the white dog, and keep heading south
see another white dog by the picnic? that's where we're going!
okay
nice job! now, step over the mat, give a hello to those yummy-looking berries, and continue your path to the west
okay
you're doing great! next, you'll see another branch
time to cross that river again, but this time to the north
okay done
that's great! now, there is a green bush ahead
don't touch it, just circle it from the right side. keep going until you reach the florist stand
okay
good job! now turn left and mosey on below the stand and towards the big bridge
notice the two cyclists there?
okay
awesome! keep heading west, pass the bridge
you're doing so well!
okay
splendid! now, you see those two elderly folk reading newspapers just past the bridge?
okay
cool! now, head south a few steps, between the old folks and another branch and stop when you reach a green bush by the end of the branch
okay
perfect! now, go east, keep the branch on your left and the bush on your right
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
okay
ok buddy! i'm standing by the tent up north. i see the dog and the fire to the south
to the right, i spot the red mushroom. what's next in our adventure?
go towards the dog and circle around the fire from your left and come towards the mushroom
cool, i'm by the dog now, i've circled the fire and i'm at the red mushroom
i see a blue car in the south from here. how do i continue?
go south of the car
alright! now i'm south of the blue car
i see a blue telescope to the south and some rocks to the west. where should i head now?
to towards the blue telescope to your south
done! i'm standing next to the blue telescope, gazing at the stars
what's next?
look to your east you will see a house go towards the house
thanks, buddy! i've reached the wooden house, looks cozy *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes im ready
awesome! glide under the first southwest palm tree. swerve to the right past the next one, then hook a left before hitting the third
head straight south. how's it looking?
looks good
nice! now, move left of the brown puppy
now veer a bit left and then take a swift right. keep heading south, buddy!
done
alright! let's dodge between those rocks, one big on your left and a smaller one on your right
aim right for the water! you are doing great!
done
spot the large red crab? hang a right towards the big rock
keep going west, in the water. comfortable so far?
done
way to go! let's scoot along that medium rock in the water until you spot a shark. don't worry it's a friendly one
then, make a tight right turn. all good?
done
awesome! head back to dry land now, make your way between the medium rock and a colourful ball
keep heading north
done
cool! now, tread slightly left, aiming for the northwest
pass between a red tent on your left and a big speaker on your right. feel the groove!
done
great! circle around the tent, counter-clockwise
fun right?
yes
now start heading south toward the water
but don't get your feet wet! turn right just before reaching the sea
done
you're near the finish line now! shimmy below the red kayak, then take a sharp right heading north
done
just one final stretch! walk along the kayak till you reach a small green bush
and guess what, you've made it! good job, dude!
done
you did great! that was fun, right? thanks for playing along!
